name: TRADITIONAL MEDICINALS
sampleDescriptions: To advance HR5587, which is a bill "To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act with respect to the regulation of hemp-derived cannabidiol and hemp-derived cannabidiol containing substances."
